summary:
MARAUDERS ERA, LONDON TWENTY-EIGHTEEN.

 Smokes that billow. Soot that stains. Dust that settles. Gods are now silent as the...
caption:
MARAUDERS ERA, LONDON TWENTY-EIGHTEEN.

Smokes that billow. Soot that stains. Dust that settles. Gods are now silent as the wizarding fragment of London is halved in two, with the oligarchical reign of the Dark Lord in one, and the Order of Phoenix as another inconsequential factor to the equation. The First Wizarding War ended years ago, but it has never meant that the battle is over. It never is.

COMING SOON TO JCINK NEAR YOU: TRACKING #DEIFORMRP. CURRENTLY STAFF SEARCHING.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: 3 Things About the Year 5 Update
body:
3 Things About the Year 5 Update

1. Why isn’t the puffskein doll a deco item in our dorm room? I am outraged. (I love Bea.)


2. I noticed while friending Barnaby that his necessary attributes to do friendship activities have increased (and this is likely true of everyone, yikes.)


3. I also noticed while friending Barnaby that the amount of points you get credited for each type of friendship action has actually increased (doubled, in fact). So I guess that’ll help with the really high points you need to farm to increase your friendship with people in game.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.name: crimsonrevolt-promo
blog.title: crimson revolt promo
blog.description: Crimson Revolt is a multi-para, literate roleplay group that takes place during the First Wizarding War. The group focuses on character and plot development through the themes of war and death. All edits posted here were created by the admins and members of Crimson Revolt and were posted with permission. For more information, please visit the main @crimsonrevolt.

summary: CRIMSON REVOLT ? CHARACTERS ? NAVIGATION ? ASK ? RULES   “How dreadful…     to be caught in a  G A M E         and have no idea...
caption:
CRIMSON REVOLT ? CHARACTERS ? NAVIGATION ? ASK ? RULES

“How dreadful…

to be caught in a G A M E

and have no idea of the rules.”

A FIRST WIZARDING WAR ROLEPLAY.

After a year of Death Eater captivity, the return of AMELIA BONES has shaken up the Wizarding World of England. As the Death Eaters try desperately to quiet Amelia and those who attempt to speak her truth, the rebel group Aversio rushes in to capitalize on her thirst for violence and quest for revenge, leaving the Order of Phoenix to wonder if their attempts at peace are as futile as they seem. Just as things seem bleak, the Daily Prophet headquarters burns high on one August night, lighting a path of opportunity for the Aversio propaganda THE QUIBBLER to make its way through the community as the public scrambles for information. With Death Eaters controlling the Ministry and Aversio terrorizing the streets, this small spark of rebellion has turned into a fire that threatens to D E S T R O Y everything in its path.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

We are a group of writers dedicated to plot and character development. As an 18+ group, we’re looking for mature, dedicated, and passionate people seeking a long term roleplay that will focus on themes such as war and death. Most threads on the dash are full of substance, which means most are paragraphs or longer gif chats! The Admin Team posts prompts, plot drops, and events as needed, averaging 1-2 major plot drops per month with smaller challenges and events in between. If you’re looking for a plot heavy group with surprises and twists, come apply today!

summary: Son of the Moon, Alternate titles!
body:
Son of the Moon, Alternate titles!

We went through many names while writing the script. Here are some alternate titles that we tried out, but ultimately didn’t stick:

Remus Lupin And the Curse of the Moon

Remus Lupin And the Son of the Moon

Curse of the Moon

Remus Lupin And the first Wizarding War

The Wizarding War

Moony (I think this was the first title we ever gave the document)

The Beast Within

tags: but at least both characters are the same age
that makes me feel a bit better
summary: I am in a dilly of a pickle. I’m playing Hogwarts Mystery, and I absolutely love Barnaby Lee. He is just the cutest little bean,...
body: I am in a dilly of a pickle. I’m playing Hogwarts Mystery, and I absolutely love Barnaby Lee. He is just the cutest little bean, and a part of me wants the playable character to fall in love with him, and there in lies the problem. At the moment, they are 15 years old, and the playable character shares my name. I am a grown ass woman, and I’m not entirely comfortable with what is ostensibly a version of me, being with someone nearly half my age.

summary:
Rita Skeeter: *appears
Everyone: *gets excited 
Me: *doesn’t actually give a shit
Still Me: “Excuse me, You Ugly Bitching Bug,...
body:
Rita Skeeter: *appears

Everyone: *gets excited

Me: *doesn’t actually give a shit

Still Me: “Excuse me, You Ugly Bitching Bug, what did you just say to one of the most Brightest Teachers at Hogwarts, not to mention one of my favorites, in my presence?!?”

reblog.comment:
Rita Skeeter: *appears

Everyone: *gets excited

Me: *doesn’t actually give a shit

Still Me: “Excuse me, You Ugly Bitching Bug, what did you just say to one of the most Brightest Teachers at Hogwarts, not to mention one of my favorites, in my presence?!?”

summary:
Le Me needs to make some new friends
Why do I relate to this quote a lot? 😐Moreover, it’s terrifying how much this girl actually...
body:
Last time on “Me playing Hogwarts Mystery”

Le Me needs to make some new friends

Why do I relate to this quote a lot? 😐Moreover, it’s terrifying how much this girl actually resembles a friend of mine who is a Ravenclaw and whose hair where once dyed in red. But more importantly she has the same appearance and personality as Tulip.

Because you haven’t met the Weasley Twins yet 😏

Bill, please, your little brother is going to be a War Hero, don’t think so mighty of yourself.

Better getting fired for being an incompetent than being possessed by an Great Evil Sorcerer or loosing your entire memory or turning into a werewolf or… Should I really continue?

Me to myself: “You’re on the way to turn him into an object, how the hell do you expect him or her to like you?!”

*Owl let’s me pet him*

“Why do I still question videogames…?”
